detectors.description: Contract coreBTC (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#14-89) is not in CapWords

coreBTC.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#14-89) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 12000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[coreBTC.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#L14-L89) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 12000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#4)
	- coreBTC.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#24-26)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#5)
	- coreBTC.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#30-32)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- coreBTC.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#34-36)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- coreBTC.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#73-77)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#9)
	- coreBTC.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#42-55)

validate(uint8) should be declared external:
	- coreBTC.validate(uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/coreBTC.sol#38-40)
